## Equations

@eq-time is a general linear equation.

$$
t[s] = 1[s]*A[km^2]+2[s]
$$ {#eq-time}

```{r}
iris |> gt()
```

@tbl-gt

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| label: tbl-kable-long
#| tbl-cap: "Caption Long Kable"
if (is_latex_output()) {
  kable(iris, booktabs = T, longtable = T) |>
    kable_styling(font_size = 8, latex_options = c("striped", "repeat_header"))
} else {
  kable(iris)
}
```
